note: Wizards are always troubled about the future. I do not like worrying about the future. I am not altogether on anybody’s side, because nobody is altogether on my side, if you understand me: nobody cares for the woods as I care for them, not even Elves nowadays. Still, I take more kindly to Elves than to others. And there are some things, of course, whose side I am altogether not on; I am against them altogether: these — burárum — these Orcs, and their masters.
